name: 5 seconds dungeon
description:
I made this game in just 2 days

this is a demo version

the full version will be out soon!!

HOW TO PLAY??

Find the exit(stair) in 5 seconds.

Don't collide with enemies and walls

this will kill you instantly!!

there is no end in the game;

so it means the game is running infinitely!!

CONTROLLER

WASD or arrow keys to move...
